text: @WhiteHouse @SecretaryCarson You @SecretaryCarson should be ashamed of yourself. You’re *supposedly* a doctor! And yet you have stood back while the @realDonaldTrump administration has spewed forth boldfaced lies, disinformation and even claimed that #COVID19 deaths are fake numbers! #BloodOnYourHands
